description: Target specimens for systematic sector coverage. Sampling frame: AI Exposure (High/Low) × Output Type (Digital/Physical). Locked 2026-02-08. Phase B enrichment + Phase C discovery targets added 2026-02-14.

samplingFrame.Q1: High AI Exposure × Digital Output — AI IS the product
samplingFrame.Q2: High AI Exposure × Physical Output — AI transforms the core
samplingFrame.Q3: Low AI Exposure × Digital Output — AI augments the edge
samplingFrame.Q4: Low AI Exposure × Physical Output — AI is peripheral (or is it?)

selectionCriteria: US-based public firm preferred (earnings call transcripts available)
CEO/leader has spoken publicly about AI strategy or transformation
Fills a quadrant or sector gap in current specimen collection
Conference presence (CES, NRF, HIMSS, AWS re:Invent, etc.) is a plus

targets.rationale: Largest company in the world. Apple Intelligence launch. Famously opaque on AI structure.
Most valuable health company globally. Optum AI is massive. Under DOJ scrutiny for AI in claims denial.

targets.conference: Mayo Clinic AI Summit; HIMSS 2026 — multi-agentic AI initiative
targets.rationale: Gold standard in healthcare AI. Multi-agentic initiative. Nonprofit = different purpose-claim structure.
Pharmacy + Aetna insurance + MinuteClinic. AI spans three different business models under one roof.

targets.conference: AWS re:Invent 2025 — Chief AI Officer Ashley Beecy on clinical AI governance
targets.rationale: Has a CAIO (rare in healthcare). Presented on AI governance.

targets.conference: HIMSS 2026 — nursing informatics and human-AI partnership
targets.rationale: NYC flagship academic medical center. Nursing informatics + human-AI partnership framing. Healthcare cluster specimen.
Cruise shutdown is a major structural finding. Barra navigated the most public AI failure in corporate history.
Aggressive AI rhetoric, BlueCruise. Ford+ restructuring separated EV/ICE divisions — classic ambidexterity.

targets.conference: AWS re:Invent 2025 — Toyota Enterprise AI, dealer assistants
targets.rationale: World's largest automaker. Woven Planet AI subsidiary. Multi-pathway strategy. Conference confirms active AI.
German luxury automaker with in-house vision-language-action model. Automotive cluster specimen.

targets.conference: CES 2026 — Neue Klasse platform, Alexa+ integration
targets.rationale: Neue Klasse platform is ground-up AI-native vehicle architecture. Automotive cluster specimen.
Building domain-specific auto LLM. Deepens automotive cluster. Sony-Honda AFEELA partnership.
Largest defense contractor. AI in classified environments. Taiclet vocal about 21st Century Security vision.
AI-native defense company. Luckey is most quotable defense CEO. Lattice OS platform.
Direct NVIDIA competitor. Su is one of the most respected tech CEOs. MI300 AI chips.
Massive turnaround story. New CEO. Foundry pivot + AI chip catch-up. Survival claims expected.
Snapshot telematics pioneer. Most data-forward insurer. Good contrast with traditional Travelers.
Most aggressive US telecom on AI. IntentCX platform.
Spans broadband + content. AI in network ops AND content creation.
Iger is extremely vocal about AI. SAG-AFTRA AI negotiations create unique structural constraints.
AI-native in recommendation, now using AI in content production. Co-CEO structure is interesting.
Financial data + media. NL-to-video is cutting edge. Bloomberg Terminal AI integration.
AI in fraud detection. Very different from banks — Visa is a network, not a lender.

targets.conference: CES 2026 — CEO keynote; AWS re:Invent 2025 — Cat AI Assistant
targets.rationale: Autonomous mining and construction. CEO keynoted CES. Heavy equipment + AI = fascinating structural challenge.
Industrial automation + aerospace + building tech. Forge platform. Recent 3-way split adds complexity.
Autonomous tractors, See & Spray. AI in agriculture is structurally unique.
AI for seismic analysis, refinery optimization. Dual relationship: uses AI AND powers data centers.
Largest renewable energy producer. AI for grid optimization. Powers AI data centers.

targets.conference: NRF 2026 — early adoption of agentic search
targets.rationale: Largest US supermarket. Agentic search is cutting edge. Good contrast with Walmart.

targets.conference: CES 2026 — collaboration with Siemens on facility digital twins
targets.rationale: Digital twins for Frito-Lay manufacturing. Physical consumer goods + AI supply chain.
AI in supply chain, demand forecasting, Nike.com personalization. New CEO — leadership transition dynamics.
One of the most vocal Fortune 500 CEOs on AI and workforce. CrowdStrike outage showed AI dependency.
AI in logistics optimization, SenseAware IoT. 'Digital transformation of the physical world.'
Autonomous vehicle partnerships. Platform vs. autonomous vehicle tension is ambidexterity story.
Specialty retail. Non-tech CEO presenting on AI at NRF is interesting signal.

targets.conference: NRF 2026 — Milo chatbot and visualization services
targets.rationale: Home improvement retail. Physical products + AI customer service.
Bezos-backed space company. Presented at AWS on enterprise AI agents.
ENRICHMENT: Largest retailer, M5c specimen but only 3 sources at Low completeness. Need investment data, structural detail on GoLocal, data ventures.
ENRICHMENT: Most important AI infrastructure company, only 5 sources at Low. Need team structure, R&D org, investment breakdown.
ENRICHMENT: Richest pharma purpose claims specimen but Low structural data. Need AI org chart, Digital CAIO details, R&D AI investment.
ENRICHMENT: European industrial giant, digital twin strategy, Xcelerator platform. Only 4 sources at Low. Flagged Session 21.
ENRICHMENT: Consumer goods AI case, 5 sources but still Low. Need team structure, AI partnership details (Microsoft), marketing AI.
ENRICHMENT: Aggressive AI pivot, Sidekick/Magic, only 4 sources. Lütke's 'reflection' memo is analytically valuable.
ENRICHMENT: AI-first transformation, Max subscription, contractor cuts. Only 4 sources. Need structural details on AI team.
ENRICHMENT: Industrial robotics + AI, European, only 2 sources. Need Robotics division AI details, reporting lines.
ENRICHMENT: Stub with only 2 sources. AI practice structure, AI-native framework, contrast with Accenture/McKinsey.
ENRICHMENT: India IT services, Cursor CoE, 100K reskilling. 6 sources but still Low. Need Topaz AI platform details.
ENRICHMENT: Rovo AI, Cognitive Revolution deep-scan in transcript queue but specimen still Low. Need AI team org, investment.
ENRICHMENT: TikTok + AI, structurally fascinating but thin (4 sources). Need Doubao LLM team, AI org structure.
NEW: Counter-example — restructuring NOT AI-driven. Control case for our theory. Flagged Session 24.
NEW: VP Autonomy, in-house silicon, vertical integration. Pure-play EV contrast with Tesla. Flagged in podcast sweep.
NEW: AI in recommendation + content, podcast AI, DJ feature. Interesting M3 candidate. Deepens media sector.
NEW: AI in fraud/payments, developer tools, private but vocal. Collison is quotable. Contrast with Visa.
NEW: UK pharma, fills geographic gap beyond US pharma cluster. AI in drug discovery.
NEW: AI-native enterprise, unique govt+commercial dual identity. AIP platform. Karp extremely quotable.
